permissions.cannot_send_messages: I do nah have th' correct permission t' send messages in 'tis channel!
permissions.cannot_send_messages_in_threads: I do nah have th' correct permission t' send messages in threads!
permissions.cannot_create_invites: I do nah have th' correct permission t' create invites in %s!

suggestions.not_found: Couldn't find that suggestion in th' cache! Please try again later!
suggestions.filtered_none_found: No suggestions found matching that filter!
suggestions.user_deleted_post: The original message for 'tis suggestion was deleted!

bot_logs.member_removed_not_found: Could nah find pirate wit' ID %s who sailed away!

repository.save_error: An error occurred while savin' th' repository: %s
repository.load_error: An error occurred while loadin' th' repository: %s
repository.stats_error: An error occurred while gettin' th' statistics for that repository: %s

commands.only_available_in_threads: 'Tis command is only available in threads!
commands.cannot_be_used_here: 'Tis command can nah be used here!

reminders.no_description: Ye need t' provide a description for th' reminder!
reminders.description_too_long: Yer description is too long! Please keep it under %d characters.
reminders.invalid_time_format: I could nah parse that date/time format, please try again!
reminders.time_in_past: Ye can nah set a reminder in th' past!
reminders.save_error: An error occurred while saving that reminder! Please try again!
reminders.delete_error: An error occurred while deleting that reminder! Please try again!
reminders.no_reminders: Ye do nah have any reminders set!
reminders.delete_reminder: Ye can delete reminders wit' `/remind delete <uuid>`
reminders.reminder_not_found: I could nah find a reminder wit' that UUID!
reminders.reminder_set: I will remind ye at %s about:

lock.no_permission: I do nah have th' correct permission t' lock %s!

config.read_error: An error occurred while reading th' config file! Please check th' logs for more information.
config.invalid_value: Could nah find given key `%s` in th' config file!

user.username_not_found: Could nah find pirate wit' username `%s`! (%s)

transfer_tag.invalid_tags: Ye have entered invalid from/to tags, please try again!
transfer_tag.no_threads_found: No threads were found wit' th' tag %s!

request_review.not_suggestion_channel: Ye can nah send threads in non-suggestion channels for review!
request_review.too_soon: Ye can nah request another review on 'tis thread yet!
request_review.not_own_thread: Ye can nah request a review on a thread ye did nah create!
request_review.already_greenlit: Ye can only request reviews on threads that are nah greenlit!
request_review.not_enough_reactions: Ye need at least %d agrees t' request a review!
request_review.bad_reaction_ratio: Ye need at least a %d%% agree ratio t' request a review!
request_review.too_new: 'Tis suggestion is too new t' request a review!
request_review.success: 'Tis suggestion has been sent for review!
request_review.accepted: Yer recent review request has been accepted! Thank ye for yer suggestion!
request_review.changes_requested: Yer recent review request has been denied. We recommend ye review yer suggestion an' make any necessary changes before requestin' another review. Thank ye!
request_review.locked: We have reviewed yer recent request an' have decided t' lock 'tis suggestion. If ye believe 'tis t' be a mistake or would like more information, please contact us through Mod Mail.

role.invalid_role: Could nah find a role wit' ID `%s`!
role.removed_role: Removed role %s from ye! Use th' same command t' add it back.
role.added_role: Added role %s t' ye! Use th' same command t' remove it.

verify.already_requested: Yer previous verification request has nah been reviewed. Ye will be contacted via DM if any further information is required.
verify.request_sent: Yer verification request has been sent. Ye will be contacted via DM if any further information is required.
verify.error: Encountered an error whilst attemptin' t' verify ye! If 'tis persists, please contact us through Mod Mail

birthday.not_set_yet: Yer birthday has nah been configured yet!
birthday.get: Yer birthday is currently set t' %s
birthday.bad_date: That doesn't seem t' be a valid date. Please try again or contact a bot developer!

mod_mail.created: Created new Mod Mail thread for %s: %s
mod_mail.channel_not_found: Could nah find th' Mod Mail channel! Is there one configured?
mod_mail.thread_not_found: Could nah find a Mod Mail thread for %s!
mod_mail.already_exists: A Mod Mail thread for %s already exists: %s
